__e: I had the best car, hottest girl, and I figured doing the one thing nobody'd ever done would be the perfect capper.
His hands are warm, and he doesn't rush throught it and make you feel like you're just another number.
Sometimes it's really badass and there's parties and hot girls and stuff like that, and sometimes...
Nothing but blood and tissue and hot, hot tears.
What does it mean when someone starts crying uncontrollably after sex?
He sheds tears, when you're sad...
